name: Friday: homemade tapas delivery
description: I designed a custom Shopify theme for a small business that creates, sells, and delivers boxes of tapas every Friday to homes around NYC.

name: Let's Eat!
img_alt: a preview of the Let's Eat homepage showing a map and restaurant information from the Yelp API
description: A restaurant randomizer to help users choose a restaurant to go to based on their location and the Yelp API. I designed the site, implemented Bulma as the CSS framework, and wrote frontend logic for conditional styling for this group project.

name: Kitchen Sink
img_alt: a preview of the Kitchen Sink homepage displaying recipes posted by users
description: A social, community-driven web application for hosting and searching recipes from a user-seeded, NoSQL database. I helped create the database architecture and wrote the APIs for this group project.

name: Employee Tracker
img_alt: the Employee Tracker start menu on the command line
description: A command-line CMS to manage a company's employee database, using Node.js, Inquirer, and MySQL.

name: tech thoughts
img_alt: a preview of my playground CMS blog tech thoughts with dummy posts on the front page
description: A sandbox: A CMS, community-driven blog for developers, engineers, and programmers to connect, learn, and share knowledge.

name: labchild's simple portfolio
img_alt: a preview of my HTML portfolio site built in October 2021
description: A simple HTML page to showcase my work. I made this at the beginning of my development journey to practice semantic HTML and basic CSS rules.
